document.full_text: syrians took to the streets in large numbers again on wednesday in the central city of homs, where activists say more than 20 pro-democracy protesters have been shot dead since monday by soldiers and irregular forces.
document.title: protest erupts in syria's homs despite new law
lines_and_colors: syrians took to the streets in large numbers again on wednesday in the central city of homs, where activists say more than 20 pro-democracy protesters have been shot dead since monday by soldiers and irregular forces.
